register.title: App registration
register.subtitle: Register the Homey app in your car
register.text1: Register the Homey app in your car to allow the app to send commands to your car.
register.text2: Follow this link or tap the Tesla icon to start the Tesla registration process.
register.text3: This registration will probably become necessary as part of Tesla's API changes. This step can currently be skipped and, if necessary, carried out later using 'Repair'.
